threads: 🌿🔵💚 Supporting a greener future doesn't mean sacrificing personal freedoms or economic prosperity. Recycling is a simple, effective way to reduce waste and protect our environment. Let's all do our part by making small changes in our daily lives.      🌍💡🔄
text: agree, but gov intervention needed for real change. recycling alone not enough.
